member.summary: Helps map a data type to similar datatypes in different environments.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.DataTypeHelper.#ctor
member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the class from being created. Created from this reference: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc716729%28v=vs.110%29.aspx

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.DataTypeHelper.ToDataType(System.String,SqlSharpener.TypeFormat,SqlSharpener.TypeFormat)
member.summary: Converts the specified source data type into the specified destination data type.
member.param: The source data type. For example bigint.
The format of the the sourceDataType parameter.
The format to convert the sourceDataType parameter to.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.DataTypeHelper.GetMap(SqlSharpener.TypeFormat,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a single data type dictionary with values for each TypeFormat by finding the specified entry in the list of data type dictionaries.
member.param: The TypeFormat of the lookupValue parameter.
The value to identify the dictionary to return.
member.returns: The first data type dictionary that contains the specified TypeFormat and value.

member.summary: Gets a single data type dictionary with values for each TypeFormat

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Creates a new TSqlModel, loads all *.sql files specified in the SqlPaths property into the new model, and then parses the model.
member.exception: No path to *.sql files exists in SqlPaths properties.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.MetaBuilder.LoadModel(System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a new TSqlModel, loads each specified sql statement into the new model, and then parses the model
member.param: One or more sql statements to load, such as CREATE TABLE or CREATE PROCEDURE statements.

member.summary: Parses the specified TSqlModel

member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix to strip off the procedure name when generating the method name.

member.summary: List of directories where *.sql exist that should be added to the model.

member.summary: Objects representing the meta data parsed from stored procedures in the model.

member.summary: Objects representing the meta data parsed from the tables in the model.

member.name: T:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper
member.summary: Helper class to handle some of the more complex code generation.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Scrubs the outputNamespace parameter to ensure it is not null.
member.returns: The value of outputNameSpace if not null.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetDtoObject(SqlSharpener.Model.Procedure,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the DTO return objects that represent a row of each result set of each procedure.
member.param: The procedure to generate the DTO from.
The number of tabs to indent the generated code.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetReturnType(SqlSharpener.Model.Procedure)
member.summary: Gets the type of object the procedure's function will return.
member.param: The procedure to get the return type for.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetReturnVariable(SqlSharpener.Model.Procedure)
member.summary: Gets the variable declaration statement for the return value.
member.param: The procedure to get the return variable declaration statement.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetReturnXmlComment(SqlSharpener.Model.Procedure)
member.summary: Gets the Xml comment to place in the <returns%gt; element.
member.param: The procedure to get the return variable declaration statement.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetMethodParamList(SqlSharpener.Model.Procedure,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the parameter list for the method.
member.param: The procedure to get the parameter list for.
if set to true [generic table value].

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetMethodParamListForInputDto(SqlSharpener.Model.Procedure)
member.summary: Gets the method parameter list for methods that call an overload with input DTO properties as parameters.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetMethodParamListForObjectArray(SqlSharpener.Model.Procedure)
member.summary: Gets the method parameter list for object array.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetSqlParamList(SqlSharpener.Model.Procedure,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the generated SqlParameter objects with assigned values.
member.param: The procedure to get the generated SqlParameters for.
The number of tabs to indent the generated code.

member.name: M:SqlSharpener.ProcedureHelper.GetExecuteStatement(SqlSharpener.Model.Procedure,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the generated statement that executes the stored procedure and loads the results into the return variable.
member.param: The procedure to get the generated execute statement for.
The number of tabs to indent the generated code.
